Pass the working end through the eye of the hook
Wrap the working end around the standing line 5â€“10 times, for lighter line more wraps are recommended
Pass the working end through the first loop
Pass the working end back through the loop you just created
Lubricate the knot with water or saliva, pull both ends to tighten the knot, then cut the tag end
Double your line over and then pass the end through the eye of the hook
Pass the working end behind the standing line
Wrap the working end around the loop
Pass the working end around the hook
Bring the working end up
Lubricate the knot with water or saliva, then pull the standing line to tighten the knot
Trim the tag end
Make a loop, pass the tag end through the eyelet and the loop
Wrap the working end around the standing line 3 times
Pass the working end through the second loop
Pass the working end through the loop you just formed
Lubricate the knot with water or saliva and then pull both ends to tighten the knot
Cut any excess off the tag end
Pass the line through the eye of the hook and make a loop with the tag end
Wrap the tag end multiple times over the line
Take the tag end out of the loop
Pull the tag end and the standing part
Make the loop of your desired size by pulling the standing part
Tighten the knot down and trim the tag end
Pass the line through the eye of the hook and loop
Pass the end through the eye
Hold and pass the loop through the standing part
Wrap the loop around the standing part
Continue wrapping 6 more times
Pull the standing part to tighten
Once tightened down it should look like this, no trimming of the tag end should be required
About Us
We are Light Line Fishing Co. your go to supply store for Ultralight Fishing
What is UltraLight Fishing?

Usually when fishing bigger is considered better, Ultralight fishing is counter to this idea focusing on catching fish in the medium to micro category. This typically involves fishing with much lighter equipment than your average fisherman, notably lures between 1/8th and 1/80oz, 1 to 6 pound line an ultralight to light weight rod and a 1000 series reel.
